biotools.summary: Knowledge-based Identification of Pathway Enzymes (KIPEs) allows the identification of players in a pathway or gene families. The identification relies of sequence similarity and phylogenetic relationships. Additionally, it is possible to consider functionally relevant amino acids.

bioschemas.name: Knowledge-based Identification of Pathway Enzymes
